content: To the mount of the daughter of Zion.
For it shall be as a wandering bird thrown out of the nest;
shall be the daughters of Moab at the fords of the Arnon.
This  the word which the  has spoken concerning Moab since that time.
But now the  has spoken, saying, “Within three years, as the years of a hired man, the glory of Moab will be despised with all that great multitude, and the remnant  very small  feeble.”
